p:
SSHT has also been used in the treatment of idiopathic interstitial pneumonia. Tanaka et al.
14 divided idiopathic interstitial pneumonia patients into a control group (n = 20) without additional medication administration and a treatment group (n = 9) administered SSHT and compared the treatment results after more than 10 months. Improvement was shown in 11.1% (1/9) of the patients in the treatment group and slight improvement (33.3%, 3 of 9 patients) was shown in the n treatment group.
